typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductNumber as string,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [ProductID],\n       [ProductNumber]\n      ,[FinishedGoodsFlag]\n      ,[Color]\n      ,[SafetyStockLevel]\n      ,[ReorderPoint]\n      ,[StandardCost]\n      ,[ListPrice]\n      ,[Size]\n      ,[SizeUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,[WeightUnitMeasureCode]\n      ,[Weight]\n      ,[DaysToManufacture]\n      ,[ProductLine]\n      ,[Class]\n      ,[Style]\n      ,[ProductSubcategoryID]\n      ,[SellStartDate]\n  FROM [Production].[Product]',
	format: 'query') ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		ModelName as string,
		EnglishDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Distinct([ProductID])\n      ,[Name] as "EnglishProductName"\n      ,[ProductModel] as "ModelName"\n      ,[Description] as "EnglishDescription"\n  FROM [Production].[vProductAndDescription] where [CultureID] = \'en\' ',
	format: 'query') ~> ProductDescription
Product, ProductDescription join(Product@ProductID == ProductDescription@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductAndDescription
ProductAndDescription derive(DealerPrice = 0.6*ListPrice,
		SizeRange = case(Size == 'M', 'M',
    Size == 'S','S',
    Size == 'L','L',
    Size == 'XL', 'XL',
    Size == '40', '38-40 CM',
    Size == '38', '38-40 CM',
    Size == '42', '42-46 CM',
    Size == '44', '42-46 CM',
    Size == '46', '42-26 CM',
    Size == '48', '48-52 CM',
    Size == '50', '48-52 CM',
    Size == '52', '48-52 CM',
    Size == '54', '54-58 CM',
    Size == '56', '54-58 CM',
    Size == '58', '54-58 CM',
    Size == '60', '60-62 CM',
    Size == '62', '60-62 CM',
    Size == '70', '70')) ~> CalculatedColumns
CalculatedColumns select(mapColumn(
		ProductKey = Product@ProductID,
		ProductAlternateKey = ProductNumber,
		ProductSubcategoryKey = ProductSubcategoryID,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName,
		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeRange,
		Weight,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice,
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName,
		EnglishDescription,
		StartDate = SellStartDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RequiredSelect
RequiredSelect filter(not(isNull(Color))) ~> FilterNullColors
FilterNullColors sink(input(
		CustomerKey as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[('DimProducts_'+toString(currentDate(),'ddMMYYYY')+'.csv')],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProductsCSV

source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n[BusinessEntityID]\n      ,[Title]\n      ,[FirstName]\n      ,[MiddleName]\n      ,[LastName]\n      ,[Suffix]\n      ,[PhoneNumber]\n      ,[EmailAddress]\n      ,[AddressLine1]\n      ,[AddressLine2]\n  FROM [Sales].[vIndividualCustomer]',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Distinct([CustomerID])\n      ,[AccountNumber]\n  FROM [Sales].[Customer]',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesVCustomer
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		BirthDate as timestamp,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [BusinessEntityID]\n      ,[BirthDate]\n      ,[MaritalStatus]\n      ,[YearlyIncome]\n      ,[Gender]\n  FROM [Sales].[vPersonDemographics]',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesDemo
SalesCustomer, SalesDemo join(SalesCustomer@BusinessEntityID == SalesDemo@BusinessEntityID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerDemographics
CustomerDemographics select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID = SalesCustomer@BusinessEntityID,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		Suffix,
		PhoneNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		BusinessEntityID = SalesDemo@BusinessEntityID,
		BirthDate,
		MaritalStatus,
		YearlyIncome,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqColumns
SelectReqColumns, SalesVCustomer join(BusinessEntityID == CustomerID,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VCustomerAndCustDemo
NameStyle select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey = CustomerID,
		CustomerAlternateKey = AccountNumber,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		NameStyle,
		BirthDate,
		MaritalStatus,
		Suffix,
		Gender,
		EmailAddress,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		YearlyIncome,
		Phone = PhoneNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReq
VCustomerAndCustDemo derive(NameStyle = toString(null())) ~> NameStyle
SelectReq filter(not(isNull(CustomerKey))) ~> FilterNullColors
FilterNullColors sink(input(
		CustomerKey as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[('DimCustomer_'+toString(currentDate(),'ddMMYYYY')+'.csv')],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustStageCsv

source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		SpecialOfferID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '    SELECT [SalesOrderID]\n        ,[SalesOrderDetailID]\n        ,[CarrierTrackingNumber]\n        ,[OrderQty]\n        ,[ProductID]\n        ,[UnitPrice]\n        ,([UnitPriceDiscount]/[UnitPrice])*100 as "UnitPriceDiscountPct"\n    FROM [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail]',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesOrderDetails
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		SalesOrderLineNumber as long,
		CustomerID as integer,
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [SalesOrderID]\n      ,[RevisionNumber]\n      ,[OrderDate]\n      ,[DueDate]\n      ,[ShipDate]\n      ,[OnlineOrderFlag]\n      ,[SalesOrderNumber],\nROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY [SalesOrderNumber] ORDER BY SalesOrderNumber) AS SalesOrderLineNumber\n      ,[CustomerID]\n      ,[TaxAmt]\n      ,[Freight]\n  FROM [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader]',
	format: 'query') ~> SalesOrderHeader
source(output(
		MaxOrderDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'Select isNull(max(OrderDate),0) as "MaxOrderDate" from [dbo].[FactInternetSales]',
	format: 'query') ~> FactTableSourceDW
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductNumber as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [ProductID]\n      ,[ProductNumber]\n      ,[StandardCost]\n  FROM [Production].[Product]',
	format: 'query') ~> ProductionTable
SalesOrderDetails, SalesOrderHeader join(SalesOrderDetails@SalesOrderID == SalesOrderHeader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinDetailHeader
CombiningAllData derive(OrderDateKey = toString(OrderDate, 'YYYYMMdd'),
		DueDateKey = toString(DueDate, 'YYYYMMdd'),
		ProductStandardCost = StandardCost,
		TotalProductCost = StandardCost - UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ShipDateKey = toString(ShipDate, 'YYYYMMdd'),
		ExtendedAmount = UnitPrice*OrderQty,
		SalesAmount = (UnitPrice - UnitPriceDiscountPct)*OrderQty,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct = 0,
		DiscountAmount = 0,
		CustomerPONumber = toString(null()),
		OrderQuantity = RevisionNumber) ~> AddedCalculatedColumns
AddedCalculatedColumns select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SalesData@ProductID,
		OrderDateKey,
		DueDateKey,
		ShipDateKey,
		CustomerKey = CustomerID,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		SalesOrderLineNumber,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderQuantity,
		UnitPrice,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		DiscountAmount,
		ProductStandardCost,
		TotalProductCost,
		SalesAmount,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		CarrierTrackingNumber,
		CustomerPONumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MappedFactInternetSource
CustomJoinCrossJoin filter(OrderDate > MaxOrderDate) ~> FilterDatesGreater
MappedFactInternetSource, FactTableSourceDW join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomJoinCrossJoin
FilterDatesGreater select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		OrderDateKey,
		DueDateKey,
		ShipDateKey,
		CustomerKey,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		SalesOrderLineNumber,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderQuantity,
		UnitPrice,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		DiscountAmount,
		ProductStandardCost,
		TotalProductCost,
		SalesAmount,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		CarrierTrackingNumber,
		CustomerPONumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMappedColumns
joinDetailHeader select(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID = SalesOrderDetails@SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID,
		CarrierTrackingNumber,
		OrderQty,
		ProductID,
		SpecialOfferID,
		UnitPrice,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		SalesOrderID = SalesOrderHeader@SalesOrderID,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		SalesOrderLineNumber,
		CustomerID,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SalesData
SalesData, ProductionTable join(SalesData@ProductID == ProductionTable@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CombiningAllData
SelectMappedColumns aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderNumber),
	each(match(name!='SalesOrderNumber'), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates sink(input(
		CustomerKey as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		YearlyIncome as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[('FactInternetSales_'+toString(currentDate(),'ddMMYYYY')+'.csv')],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactStage

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		OrderDateKey as integer,
		DueDateKey as integer,
		ShipDateKey as integer,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		SalesOrderLineNumber as integer,
		RevisionNumber as short,
		OrderQuantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as double,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as integer,
		DiscountAmount as integer,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		SalesAmount as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		CustomerPONumber as string,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['FactInternetSales_*.csv']) ~> CSVFactStagedFile
CSVFactStagedFile filter(not(isNull(ProductID))) ~> RemovingNullValues
RemovingNullValues sink(input(
		ProductKey as integer,
		OrderDateKey as integer,
		DueDateKey as integer,
		ShipDateKey as integer,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		SalesOrderLineNumber as byte,
		RevisionNumber as byte,
		OrderQuantity as short,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		ExtendedAmount as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as double,
		DiscountAmount as double,
		ProductStandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		TotalProductCost as decimal(19,4),
		SalesAmount as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		CustomerPONumber as string,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductKey = ProductID,
		OrderDateKey,
		DueDateKey,
		ShipDateKey,
		CustomerKey,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		SalesOrderLineNumber,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderQuantity,
		UnitPrice,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		DiscountAmount,
		ProductStandardCost,
		TotalProductCost,
		SalesAmount,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		CarrierTrackingNumber,
		CustomerPONumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactInternetDW
